titles.title: I Was Glad When They Said Unto Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I was glad when they said unto me, I was glad when they said unto me, I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our feet now stand in her gates. Our feet now stand in her gates. Our feet now stand in her gates. We shall stay in the house of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peace is within her walls. Peace is within her walls. Peace is within her walls. Let us rest in the house of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For our brethren’s sake we will say, For our brethren’s sake we will say, For our brethren’s sake we will say, Let us dwell in the peace of the Lord.{/lang-eng}
